text: Hello, we have a tight turnaround project for a client who needs a password protected page built for 9/9. We have content and the wireframe, please DM me if interested and I will be happy to share more info.

Greetings all! I’m looking to expand my front end development team. Quality html, css (sass), JavaScript? Are you comfortable with local dev, GitHub, HubSpot as well as the occasional Wordpress or Drupal site? DM me please. Americas time zones preferred.

We are hiring for a Digital Project Manager at Remotish!
If you know any great PMs who have managed HubSpot website (CMS) projects, I would love to meet them!
See the job description and apply here: <https://www.remotish.agency/HubSpot-technical-project-strategist-usa>
